title: wine_Avennia_2012_Sestina_Red_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))
text:
Unnamed: 0: 28249.
country: US.
description: This standout wine is 72% Cabernet Sauvignon, 19% Merlot and 9% Cabernet Franc mostly from old blocks at Dionysus, Red Willow and Bacchus vineyards. It's youthful with aromas of toasty barrel spices, dark roasted coffee and high-toned savory herbs. Flavors are light and restrained while still showing a lot of richness, with the dark fruit notes backed by mouthwatering acids. Just a baby now, this is a 20-year wine that should start to strut its stuff after 2024. Give it a 24-hour decant if opening it in the near term..
designation: Sestina.
points: 93.
price: 60.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Columbia Valley (WA).
region_2: Columbia Valley.
taster_name: Sean P. Sullivan.
